BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20075545 SCQ  pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new 800-seat intermediate/high school building for the Queens Gateway to Health Sciences Secondary School, located on the grounds of Queens Hospital Center, south side of Goethals Avenue between 160th and 162nd Streets (Block 6858, Lot 1 in portion), in Council District 24.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: School Construction, Queens Gateway to Health Sciences Secondary School, Queens (20075545SCQ)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20075545 SCQ  pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new 800-seat intermediate/high school building for the Queens Gateway to Health Sciences Secondary School, located on the grounds of Queens Hospital Center, south side of Goethals Avenue between 160th and 162nd Streets (Block 6858, Lot 1 in portion), in Council District 24.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
